localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
blogPost.body: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
blogPost.title: Can I Trade It? - Which brokerages let you trade $GME, $NOK, $BB, $AMC, etc..
blogPost.author: Connor Van Ooyen

localize.description: 如果你没有(jk，大家都听说过)... ... --------- 简单的网站，显示哪些经纪公司允许/阻止某些应用程序的交易，这样你就可以弄清楚你想把你的钱也转移到哪里去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以让你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

localize.description: 如果你沒有(jk，大家都聽說過)... ... --------- 簡單的網站，顯示哪些經紀公司允許/阻止某些應用程序的交易，這樣你就可以弄清楚你想把你的錢也轉移到哪裏去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以讓你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

previous.excerpt: Seedr simplifies the way you get stuff, stream and access it.
previous.title: Seedr - Paste any website link, download & stream on your device

localize.description: Seedr简化了你获取东西的方式，流和访问它。
localize.tagline: 粘贴任何网站链接，在您的设备上下载和流式传输

localize.description: Seedr簡化了你獲取東西的方式，流和訪問它。
localize.tagline: 粘貼任何網站鏈接，在您的設備上下載和流式傳輸

next.excerpt: Version 2 is now here: In addition to all the typical creative tools you are familiar with, you'll also find a wide collection of hidden tools that help you bring your ideas to life.
next.title: Hidden Tools 2.0 - Discover a wide collection of tools

localize.description: 第2版现在在这里。除了所有你熟悉的典型创意工具之外，你还会发现大量的隐藏工具，帮助你把你的想法变成现实。
第2版現在在這裏。除了所有你熟悉的典型創意工具之外，你還會發現大量的隱藏工具，幫助你把你的想法變成現實。
